column2: build scripts: allow products to define special icons for EAP builds

column3: бн following commit 6e3a084 for Mac icns files only.
Merged manually, thank you for the contribution!
Note that it isn't enough to copy proper icons to the product distributions, the IDE also need to use them at runtime. This is now fixed in 183.* builds, see IDEA-192585 for details.
